t: Can you sell generic items on Amazon? - Riverbend Consulting
s: December 18, 2024 - Amazon has evolved. Shoppers want more than just the cheapest option—they want trust, quality and value. Generic items don’t offer the same credibility as a recognizable brand, so you’ll need to work twice as hard to get noticed.

t: Would you buy an expensive brand product on Amazon? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 5): It depends on what it is. However I would not buy it just because it had a brand name. I would at the reviews and look at peoples satisfaction with the product, I would look at manufacturers warranty, product quality etc before making a decision. Last I would look at similar item...

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Brand Stores help build brand awareness by showcasing your brand and product catalog on your own Amazon web address. You can create a Brand Store at no additional cost—with no coding necessary.

t: Amazon’s new 'Buy for Me' feature helps customers find and buy products from other brands’ sites
s: April 3, 2025 - New beta feature allows customers to use their Amazon Shopping app to complete purchases from other brand retailer websites if Amazon doesn’t sell the item directly.

t: Why do some products on Amazon look the same but have different brand names? - Quora
s: Answer: This is simple to answer. They look similar because the different brands are using the same supplier. This is ok but I suspect they are taking a generic product (like skin cream or headphones) but are not doing any modifications beyond putting their brand name on the product and packaging...
